multistructural.description: that takes a list of numbers and returns their sum. First I'll set up a total variable, then loop through all numbers adding each to the total, and finally return the result.

segmentation.explanation_portion: that takes a list of numbers
First I'll set up a total variable

segmentation.code:
for number in numbers:
        total += number
segmentation.explanation_portion: then loop through all numbers adding each to the total

relational.description: Returns the sum of a list of numbers
